nodes.text: Fraal was a doglike humanoid companion of Nevo and traveled with him in search of Boba Fett after their executions were commuted by Darth Vader. Fraal specifically was like the Bloodhound and could sniff Fett out (on foot). He and the rest of Nevo's gang were killed in the search; Fraal himself was killed by one of Fett's heat-seeking wrist-rockets on Maryx Minor.
